languages.text: "Вот как". {n}Старуха внимательно смотрит на вас поверх окуляров.{/n} "Прискорбные известия — даже если ваш поступок был вынужденным, потеря губернатора означает потерю стабильности, радеть о которой — непреложный долг любого слуги Администратума. Что ж, теперь к протоколу..." {n}Префект поворачивается к сервочерепу.{/n}

"I see." {n}The old woman looks at you intently over her ocular lenses.{/n} "This is regrettable news. Even if your action was forced by circumstance, the loss of the governor means the loss of the very stability that any servant of the Administratum is immutably obligated to uphold and protect. Well, let us get to the record then..." {n}The prefect turns to the servo-skull.{/n}

Что ж, теперь к протоколу..." {n}Префект поворачивается к сервочерепу.{/n}

languages.text: "Verstehe." {n}Die alte Frau sieht dich durch ihre Okularlinsen eindringlich an.{/n} "Das ist eine bedauerliche Nachricht. Selbst wenn Euer Handeln durch die Umstände erforderlich war, bedeutet der Verlust des Gouverneurs auch den Verlust der Stabilität, die jeder Diener des Administratums unverrückbar erhalten und schützen muss. Gut, sehen wir uns den Bericht einmal an ..." {n}Die Präfektin wendet sich dem Servoschädel zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see." {n}The old woman looks at you intently over her ocular lenses.{/n} "This is regrettable news. Even if your action was forced by circumstance, the loss of the governor means the loss of the very stability that any servant of the Administratum is immutably obligated to uphold and protect. Well, let us get to the record then..." {n}The prefect turns to the servo-skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Verstehe." {n}Die alte Frau sieht dich durch ihre Okularlinsen eindringlich an.{/n} "Das ist eine bedauerliche Nachricht. Selbst wenn Euer Handeln durch die Umstände erforderlich war, bedeutet der Verlust des Gouverneurs auch den Verlust der Stabilität, die jeder Diener des Administratums unverrückbar erhalten und schützen muss. Gut, sehen wir uns den Bericht einmal an ..." {n}Die Präfektin wendet sich dem Servoschädel zu.{/n}

languages.text: « Je vois. » {n}La vieille femme vous observe attentivement par-dessus ses lorgnons mécaniques.{/n} « Voilà une bien regrettable nouvelle. Cela étant dit, quand bien même les circonstances vous auraient dicté votre conduite, la perte du gouverneur menace la stabilité que tout serviteur de l'Administratum se doit de maintenir et de préserver. Greffier, prenez note... » {n}La préfète se tourne vers le servocrâne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see." {n}The old woman looks at you intently over her ocular lenses.{/n} "This is regrettable news. Even if your action was forced by circumstance, the loss of the governor means the loss of the very stability that any servant of the Administratum is immutably obligated to uphold and protect. Well, let us get to the record then..." {n}The prefect turns to the servo-skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vois. » {n}La vieille femme vous observe attentivement par-dessus ses lorgnons mécaniques.{/n} « Voilà une bien regrettable nouvelle. Cela étant dit, quand bien même les circonstances vous auraient dicté votre conduite, la perte du gouverneur menace la stabilité que tout serviteur de l'Administratum se doit de maintenir et de préserver. Greffier, prenez note... » {n}La préfète se tourne vers le servocrâne.{/n}

languages.text: “我明白了。”{n}老妇人的目光透过镜片，聚精会神地盯着你。{/n}“这是个令人遗憾的消息。尽管您是在迫不得已的情况下采取行动，但那颗行星失去了总督，这也意味着它失去了内政部不遗余力维持的秩序与稳定。好吧，既然如此，我们可以开始进行记录了……”{n}行政官转向了身边的伺服头骨。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see." {n}The old woman looks at you intently over her ocular lenses.{/n} "This is regrettable news. Even if your action was forced by circumstance, the loss of the governor means the loss of the very stability that any servant of the Administratum is immutably obligated to uphold and protect. Well, let us get to the record then..." {n}The prefect turns to the servo-skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我明白了。”{n}老妇人的目光透过镜片，聚精会神地盯着你。{/n}“这是个令人遗憾的消息。尽管您是在迫不得已的情况下采取行动，但那颗行星失去了总督，这也意味着它失去了内政部不遗余力维持的秩序与稳定。好吧，既然如此，我们可以开始进行记录了……”{n}行政官转向了身边的伺服头骨。{/n}

languages.text: «Entiendo». {n}La anciana te lanza una mirada intensa tras sus lentes oculares.{/n} «Esa es una noticia lamentable. Incluso si las circunstancias forzaron sus actos, la pérdida del gobernador conlleva la pérdida de la misma estabilidad que todo sirviente del Administratum está necesariamente obligado a mantener y proteger. Bueno, pasemos pues al registro...». {n}La prefecta se gira hacia el servocráneo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see." {n}The old woman looks at you intently over her ocular lenses.{/n} "This is regrettable news. Even if your action was forced by circumstance, the loss of the governor means the loss of the very stability that any servant of the Administratum is immutably obligated to uphold and protect. Well, let us get to the record then..." {n}The prefect turns to the servo-skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo». {n}La anciana te lanza una mirada intensa tras sus lentes oculares.{/n} «Esa es una noticia lamentable. Incluso si las circunstancias forzaron sus actos, la pérdida del gobernador conlleva la pérdida de la misma estabilidad que todo sirviente del Administratum está necesariamente obligado a mantener y proteger. Bueno, pasemos pues al registro...». {n}La prefecta se gira hacia el servocráneo.{/n}

languages.text: 「そうですか」{n}老女は眼鏡越しにじっとあなたを見つめた。{/n}「残念なお知らせですね。たとえあなたの行動が状況に強いられたものであっても、総督の喪失は、帝国行政局のどの奉仕者も揺るぎなく守り続けるべき安定そのものを失うことを意味します。さて、それでは記録に取りかかりましょうか…」{n}総監はサーヴォスカルに向き直った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see." {n}The old woman looks at you intently over her ocular lenses.{/n} "This is regrettable news. Even if your action was forced by circumstance, the loss of the governor means the loss of the very stability that any servant of the Administratum is immutably obligated to uphold and protect. Well, let us get to the record then..." {n}The prefect turns to the servo-skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうですか」{n}老女は眼鏡越しにじっとあなたを見つめた。{/n}「残念なお知らせですね。たとえあなたの行動が状況に強いられたものであっても、総督の喪失は、帝国行政局のどの奉仕者も揺るぎなく守り続けるべき安定そのものを失うことを意味します。さて、それでは記録に取りかかりましょうか…」{n}総監はサーヴォスカルに向き直った。{/n}

languages.text: "Anlıyorum." {n}Yaşlı kadın, oküler merceklerinin ardından dikkatle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Üzücü bir haber. Bu eyleminiz koşullar nedeniyle zorunlu kılınmış olsa dahi valinin kaybı, aynı zamanda bir Administratum hizmetkârının koşulsuz şekilde korumakla yükümlü olduğu istikrarın da yitirildiği anlamına gelir. Pekâlâ, kayda geçelim o hâlde..." {n}Prefekt, hizmelete doğru dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see." {n}The old woman looks at you intently over her ocular lenses.{/n} "This is regrettable news. Even if your action was forced by circumstance, the loss of the governor means the loss of the very stability that any servant of the Administratum is immutably obligated to uphold and protect. Well, let us get to the record then..." {n}The prefect turns to the servo-skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum." {n}Yaşlı kadın, oküler merceklerinin ardından dikkatle sana bakar.{/n} "Üzücü bir haber. Bu eyleminiz, koşullar nedeniyle zorunlu kılınmış olsa dahi valinin kaybı, aynı zamanda bir Administratum hizmetkârının koşulsuz şekilde korumakla yükümlü olduğu istikrarın da yitirildiği anlamına gelir. Pekâlâ, kayda geçelim o hâlde..." {n}Prefekt, hizmelete doğru döner.{/n}
